lyrics:
14 contributorslosing my religion lyricsintro
my my my

verse 1

im losing my religion my my my

light a match and watch it burn
to your heart i will return
no one could love me like you do oh no no no no no
so why would i want a substitute

im losing my religion

see lauren daigle liveget tickets as low as 37you might also likebridge

cause i need something different
and different looks like you

and finding something new
cause i need something different
and different looks like you my my my my my my
